article:
Steve, a twelve-year-old boy with alcoholic  parents, had been failing since first grade . His  _  was not in school, but in
the woods, where he often escaped alone, trying to  shut out  the sights, sounds
and smells of his alcoholic home. As he was passed on from grade to grade, he
went unnoticed... until  Miss White  .
Miss White was a smiling, young, beautiful girl, and for the first time in his life , Steve couldn't take eyes off his teacher; yet, still he failed. He   _  did his homework. He
continued to dream of other things. But one day, Miss White's voice  _  into his daydreams.
"Steve! You're   _  enough! Don't
give up on your life! I care about you!"
Suddenly, Steve   _  it! Someone,
totally perfect, cared about him!
Steve went home from school,   _  that afternoon. He quickly gathered up his  _  . Serious and determined,
he  _  for the woods.
The following Monday he arrived at school   on time  . Miss White walked in the classroom and gave a  _  on
the weekend homework. Steve hurried through the test, and was the first to  hand in  his paper. With a  _  of surprise, Miss White took his paper.
Obviously  _  , she began to look it over. Suddenly, her face broke into
a big  _  .
From that moment   _  was the same
for Steve. Life at home remained the same, but life still changed. He  _  that
not only could he learn , but he was good at it! Steve began to excel! And he  _  this course throughout his school life.
You see, it's  _  , really. A
change took place within the heart of one boy, all because of one teacher, who
cared.
